CatDescriptText: Portions of text of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 12, 1961, pg. 16, reads: "The family of the late James Johnson of 2026 Bedford Ave., who passed away at 7:30 P.M., Sunday, July 30, 1961, in Presbyterians Hospital... The late Mr. Johnson was a committeeman of the Fifth Ward, Second District..."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of James Johnson wearing light colored hat, small moustache, and herringbone overcoat, posed in front of light colored circular background, in Harris Studio
